channel.title: Elmhurst on Gourmand Syndrome
channel.description: Recent content in Elmhurst on Gourmand Syndrome

item.title: Zaab Zaab
item.description: Zaab Zaab is a highly rated New York Times restaurant that serves North Eastern Thai food. We have been trying various Thai flavors that are very different than your typical Thai restaurant. I’ve noticed that these North/Eastern restaurants tend to have much more bolder and spicier flavors that are a bit more adventurous than what you’d normally expect. This is located fairly close to the 7 or E train by exiting off Jackson Heights / Roosevelt Ave.

item.title: Happy Stony Noodle
item.description: Cheap. It’s ok beef noodle + stinky tofu. Beef noodle with mustard green was ok.
